name: Multiplayer EXPO Game
description:
Instructions:

Use the mouse to look around 

and W,A,S,D to move. 

Enter the question booth to get your question.

Then go to the answer booths. If you think the option in the booth is the answer, 

Click the take option button and go back to the question booth to check your answer.

If you want to play alone click host and start playing.

If you want to play with others, before clicking host, 

tell them your IP address

(written in the menu screen) which they have to 

type into the bar asking the IP address and click 

join after you clicked host. 

Multiplayer can only be played on the local wifi network .
